page.title: 13SERMONS DAY SMITHILLS CHAPEL
page.content: On Sunday I put on my white dress and set off for Smithills Chapel.The service was led by our Vicar and the speaker was a Vicar from Rochdale;it lasted for an hour.Afterwards I walked home and changed into my Inter's uniform. After meeting at Smithills Dean School we walked in procesion along the Dean, Smithills Croft Road,Redcar Road, Jesmond Road and back to school.In the parade were Inters and Juno Campaigners,Sunday School,parents and the Chapel Band.The congregation was 100.It lasted about an hour.I had my tea,then went to the Chapel.I helped my Dad with the books.The service at Smithills Chapel went on for about 90 minutes and the school choir sang.The service was lead by our Vicar and the visiting Vicar preached the sermon.We all wore our school uniform.
